showScoreExcerpt:
The actors playing the high school age characters are all really incredible for their ages, but the stand out performances in this show come overwhelmingly from the adult characters. It makes logical sense that a lifetime in the business provides vital experience, insight, and skills that young performers don't have yet. Their juxtaposition with highly experienced adults made for an uneven audience experience where I spent a lot of time waiting for the adults to reappear.
